personas.description: Anyone represents a standard user of the app without a specific role. This user has access to functionality that is not explicitly restricted.
Alex is an Open Space organizer and has access to the "Planning" UI. He organizes the Event Modeling Open Space in Berlin.
Jane is interested in Event Modeling and attends the Event Modeling Open Space in Berlin. She already voted for topics.
